General.Name: Shaanxi International Trust Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi International Trust Co.,Ltd. engages in the trust and financial businesses in China. The company offers trust loans and investment, financial leasing, credit guarantee, financial consulting, and venture capital for enterprises and projects. It also provides asset serving trust, such as wealth management, administrative management, asset securitization, risk disposal, and new asset services trusts; asset management trust, including fixed-income trust, equity trust, hybrid trust plans, and commodities and financial derivative trust plans; and charitable and other charitable trust. Further, it offers fund financing and equity investment services; and asset services, restructuring and mergers and acquisitions, consulting management, etc. The company was formerly known as Shaanxi Province Finance Joint Investment Company. Shaanxi International Trust Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is based in Xi'an, China.
